survey_name: Gen Z Digital Banking Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the digital banking preferences, behaviors, and satisfaction levels among Gen Z consumers to help financial institutions improve their digital banking services.

questions.question_text: How often do you use digital banking services (e.g., mobile banking apps, online banking)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use digital banking services (e.g., mobile banking apps, online banking)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for this multi-choice question to allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are comprehensive.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you prefer digital banking over traditional in-branch banking?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option for additional input. Ensure the options cover common reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with optional open-text for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you prefer digital banking over traditional in-branch banking?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your current digital banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly and allows for longer responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your current digital banking app?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features of your digital banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale for this question. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features of your digital banking app?
